co.uk.genonline.simpleweb.web.gallery

Interface Gallery

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GalleryDefault

    public interface Gallery
    Created by thomassecondary on 20/04/15. Manages images and thumbnails for a gallery with a given name. The objects created with Gallery type will set up a tight binding between the object and a folder which contains the images to be displayed within the Gallery.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GalleryStatus getGalleryStatus() 
      java.lang.String getHtml()
      Generates and returns the HTML used to display this gallery
      java.util.List<GalleryImage> getImageList()
      Returns a List containing one GalleryImage object for each image being managed within the gallery.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the string which is the name of the gallery (and folder where images are stored).
      int getNumberOfImages() 
      boolean isModified()
      Checks whether the gallery has been modified since last updated.
      void updateGallery()
      Instructs the gallery to refresh its data, including: - List of images and information about images - Thumbnails - HTML

    • Method Detail

      • getImageList

        java.util.List<GalleryImage> getImageList()
        Returns a List containing one GalleryImage object for each image being managed within the gallery.
        Returns:

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the string which is the name of the gallery (and folder where images are stored).
        Returns:

      • isModified

        boolean isModified()
        Checks whether the gallery has been modified since last updated. This will check whether any of the images have changed or whether there are any new images.
        Returns:

      • updateGallery

        void updateGallery()
        Instructs the gallery to refresh its data, including: - List of images and information about images - Thumbnails - HTML

        java.lang.String getHtml()
        Generates and returns the HTML used to display this gallery
